title: Newly Launched Live Happy Now Podcast Featured on iTunes "New and Noteworthy" Page
text:
Live Happy LLC 
DALLAS, Sept. 3, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Live Happy Now a new podcast from Live Happy magazine has been featured on the "New and Noteworthy" page and ranked #1 in the Health, and Science and Medicine "New and Noteworthy" categories within its first week on iTunes. 
https://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150903/263418 
The weekly audio series offers listeners scientifically proven tips and ideas to live a happier and more meaningful life through interviews with positive psychology and well-being thought leaders, such as Deepak Chopra, Tom Rath, Jonathan Haidt, Shawn Achor, Michelle Gielan, Christine Carter, Tory Johnson and many others. Upcoming topics include "Self-Compassion" and "Happiness: Getting the Fundamentals Right." 
Live Happy Now is the newest way Live Happy is reaching people as part of their global movement to make the world a happier place. As leaders in the happiness space, Live Happy also shares its message through a bi-monthly magazine available on newsstands and digitally, LiveHappy.com , interactive social handles and an annual #HappyActs campaign celebrating the International Day of Happiness. 
"It's been an exciting week with the new September/October issue hitting stands with Anthony Anderson on the cover and the successful launch of the Live Happy Now podcast on iTunes," said Deborah K. Heisz, Live Happy's co-founder, COO and editorial director. "We are thrilled to now be able to offer happiness for people on the go, as we know so many of our readers are." 
Live Happy Now is free to all listeners to download from the iTunes store. Live Happy is available on newsstands at major retailers throughout the U.S. including Barnes & Noble, Whole Foods and Hudson News, and in Canada at Presse Commerce newsstands, among others. Live Happy 's digital edition is available from the App Store and on Google Play, and current subscribers receive complimentary access on their tablet devices. Separate digital subscriptions are available for $9.99 at www.livehappy.com . 
About Live Happy Live Happy LLC, owned by veteran entrepreneur Jeff Olson, is a company dedicated to promoting and sharing authentic happiness through education, integrity, gratitude and community awareness. Headquartered in Dallas, Texas, its mission is to impact the world by bringing the happiness movement to a personal level and inspiring people to engage in purpose-driven, healthy, meaningful lives.
